creator.description:
I'm a labeler service for defining people who are content creators with labels!

All labels are currently applied and appealed manually! Currently. All requests will be reviewed in time. ðŸ’–

(May or may not get every single category, but I'm trying!)

locales.description: 3D Artists are content creators who specialize in 3D graphics! From character, environmental, vehicular, etc!
locales.name: 3D Artist

locales.description: Game Reviewers are content creators that specifically review video games in written articles or video formats!
locales.name: Game Reviewer

locales.description: Utaite/Youtaite are content creators who are cover song artists.
locales.name: Utaite/Youtaite

locales.description: ASMRtists are content creators as you would expect focus on ASMR and being able to stimulate a good feel from certain sounds produced!
locales.name: ASMRtist

locales.description: One that makes content using their own voice! Different from singing. They bring content to life with the way they act out using their vocal talent!
locales.name: Voice Actor

locales.description: A content creator who likes creating animations! Whether it's 2D or 3D. Or in certain programs like Live2D or MMD!
locales.name: Animator

locales.description: Content creators that, much like a VTuber, use various mediums to represent themself through livestream platforms!
locales.name: Vstreamer

locales.description: Content creators who make art or designs! This is reserved for non-AI. Please understand.
locales.name: Artist/Designer

locales.description: A content creator who makes content through streaming on various services like Twitch, YouTube, and more! You may or may not have seen their clips floating around on different services as well!
locales.name: Streamer

locales.description: Content Creator who performs through singing! Whether it's their own songs or performing covers of other songs!
locales.name: Singer

locales.description: Content Creators who specialize in creating or performing music! Whether it's their own music or performing covers of other scores!
locales.name: Musician

locales.description: Content creators that specifically use either 2D/3D/PNG models/images to represent themselves and their brand! Over time, they're not only just on YouTube, but other services as well!
locales.name: Virtual YouTuber

locales.description: Content creators who mostly make content by posting videos!
locales.name: Videographers/Vloggers

locales.description: Content Creator label for photographers! Anything where you're legitimately taking a picture! Whether it be nature, cosplay, etc!
locales.name: Photographers

locales.description: Content Creator label for Writers! Those who create content whether it be writing books, blog posts, articles, etc!
locales.name: Writer

locales.description: An influencer is a content creator for their own personal brand! (This is a catch all, kinda.)
locales.name: Influencer
